body_html:
Longer term we should stop checking precise types in VariableType.cpp, and rely on the underlying Type to check precise types (float vs. double). We're not doing this now because unpack_any is slower than unpack.

Short term, we should just do whatever to make this function work. Special-casing in gen_variable_type.py is fine with me.

Short term, we should just do whatever to make this function work. Special-casing in gen_variable_type.py is fine with me.
body:
Longer term we should stop checking precise types in VariableType.cpp, and rely on the underlying `Type` to check precise types (float vs. double). We're not doing this now because `unpack_any` is slower than `unpack`.

Short term, we should just do whatever to make this function work. Special-casing in `gen_variable_type.py` is fine with me.
